nodes.text: The Escarte Guard was an armed security group of the Commerce Guild's security forces and was part of the Confederacy of Independent Systems' military forces during the three-year Clone Wars between the Galactic Republic and the Confederacy.

The Escarte Guard was first mentioned in the new Star Wars canon in Rise of the Separatists, a 2019 supplement to Fantasy Flight Games' series of Star Wars Roleplaying products. It was originally created for the Star Wars Legends continuity, first appearing in the 2005 novel Labyrinth of Evil, written by James Luceno.
